code: import $ from'jquery';var sliderSettings=function sliderSettings(){$(".carousel .carousel-item").each(function(){var next=$(this).next();if(!next.length){next=$(this).siblings(":first");}next.children(":first-child").clone().appendTo($(this));for(var i=0;i<2;i++){next=next.next();if(!next.length){next=$(this).siblings(":first");}next.children(":first-child").clone().appendTo($(this));}});};export default sliderSettings;
